text: The Citroën Xsara Picasso is a compact MPV from Citroën introduced in 1999. Its successor, the Citroën C4 Picasso, was introduced in 2006, but the Xsara Picasso still continued to be made until 2012. == Engines == * 1.6 i 65 kW (88 hp) and 70 kW (95 hp) * 1.6 i 16V 80 kW (109 hp) * 1.8 i 16V 85 kW (115 hp) * 2.0 i 16V 100 kW (136 hp) * 1.6 HDi 66 kW (90 hp) and 80 kW (109 hp) * 2.0 HDi 66 kW (90 hp) ==Related pages== Xsara Picasso Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Citroën Xsara Picasso
